name: Find the difference - Emoji
description:
In this game you have two tables of emoji images,
both of emoji matrices contains the same emoji pictures in the same locations except for one.
That one - different emoji is your goal - you have to find it before time runs out.
With every find of different emoji time limit is getting a bit shorter and from time to time table of emojies are getting bigger, so it gets harder and harder...
You can also play level by level.
In levels mode you have to find given number of different emojies in same emojies table before time runs out.
